name: Scrafty
description: The Hoodlum Pokémon. It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Upon causing an opponent to faint, this Pokémon may immediately take another action.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.
